alert.note: Alert for Assumption; St. James; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 16 at 3:23AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 10 above zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 above zero. * WHERE...Assumption, St. James and St. John The Baptist Parishes. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST today. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Sidewalks and roads, particularly bridges, overpasses, and lesser traveled secondary roads, will become slippery. The hazardous conditions could impact the commute tonight and Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... A mix of rain, light freezing rain and freezing drizzle is currently moving across this area this morning. Precipitation ends from west to east not too long after sunrise this morning, but remaining water on roads freezing icy roads are likely to continue into the morning commute as any remaining water on roads could quickly freezing.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; St. James; St. John The Baptist
